document_data.name: Althidon Alastrarra
document_data.mainbody: '''Althidon Alastrarra''' was an ancestor of the [[Alastrarra]] of [[Cormanthyr]] in the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Althidon had perished about two centuries prior to the {{YearlinkName|241}}, roughly in the year of the {{YearlinkName|50}}. The casements of [[Alastrarra]] were Althidon's work, and the finest in [[Cormanthor]] as of 241 DR.
